name: NuScale Power, Inc.
description: NuScale Power, Inc. is an innovative leader in the nuclear energy sector, focused on developing small modular reactors (SMRs) to provide safe, reliable, and carbon-free energy. Founded in 2007, NuScale aims to transform the way nuclear energy is generated by offering scalable solutions that can be deployed in a variety of settings, including remote locations and smaller grids. Their flagship product, the NuScale Power Module, is designed to be factory-built and can be assembled on-site, significantly reducing construction time and costs associated with traditional nuclear power plants. With a strong emphasis on safety, the NuScale design incorporates passive safety features that ensure the reactor can operate safely even in the event of an emergency. As the world seeks to reduce carbon emissions and transition to sustainable energy sources, NuScale's technology presents a compelling alternative to fossil fuels and supports the global push towards a cleaner energy future. The company is strategically positioned to support both national and international energy needs, providing a reliable solution that complements renewable energy sources. NuScale's commitment to innovation and sustainability is reflected in its partnerships with various stakeholders, including government bodies, energy companies, and research institutions, to advance nuclear technology and promote its benefits.
